title: Mini-Ep 141: Fresh Air and Underwear
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 141: Fresh Air and Underwear
itunes:subtitle: Kate’s given up on teeth-brushing and Doree reveals a secret thespian past. Then they talk about The Great Pottery Throwdown, how to get out of the habit of talking behind people’s backs, and cute but comfortable underwear suggestions. Acti...
description:
Kate’s given up on teeth-brushing and Doree reveals a secret thespian past. Then they talk about The Great Pottery Throwdown, how to get out of the habit of talking behind people’s backs, and cute but comfortable underwear suggestions. 


Activity of the Day: Put out a bird-feeder!


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
